title: Booed Srini bailed out by presence of Sachin
description: Narayanswami Srinivasan had his way and presented the World Cup to Michael Clarke, but had to suffer the embarrassment of being booed by a section of the record-shattering 93,013 turnout at the MCG.
summary: Narayanswami Srinivasan had his way and presented the World Cup to Michael Clarke, but had to suffer the embarrassment of being booed by a section of the record-shattering 93,013 turnout at the MCG.
author: ttfeedback@abpmail.com

title: More to this town than robber Rana
description: Pantua. From time immemorial, the blackish-brown fried sweet, oblong in shape, has been Ranaghat's calling card. It has put my hometown on the west bank of the Churni river on the gastronomic map of Bengal. But what the pantua never did, a ghastly incident at the Convent of Jesus and Mary has: leave its 72,000 residents ashamed and angry in the glare of unwanted attention.
summary: Pantua. From time immemorial, the blackish-brown fried sweet, oblong in shape, has been Ranaghat's calling card. It has put my hometown on the west bank of the Churni river on the gastronomic map of Bengal. But what the pantua never did, a ghastly incident at the Convent of Jesus and Mary has: leave its 72,000 residents ashamed and angry in the glare of unwanted attention.

title: Kerala Church deal with nun
description: The Catholic Church in Kerala will pay Rs 12 lakh to help a nun "settle herself in life'' after she alleged that she was tortured and expelled from her convent for resisting the advances of a priest.
summary: The Catholic Church in Kerala will pay Rs 12 lakh to help a nun "settle herself in life'' after she alleged that she was tortured and expelled from her convent for resisting the advances of a priest.
author: ttfeedback@abpmail.com

title: Guwahati in queue for tea cold storage
description: A Siliguri-based online brand, Teabox, is setting up cold storages for tea in Siliguri (Bengal) followed by Guwahati (Assam) and Coonoor (Kerala).
summary: A Siliguri-based online brand, Teabox, is setting up cold storages for tea in Siliguri (Bengal) followed by Guwahati (Assam) and Coonoor (Kerala).

title: Cops SIT up to probe Naxalite cases
description: The home department, under chief minister Raghubar Das, has directed police to create a network of special investigation teams (SITs) under Jharkhand Jaguar, in a welcome move to fast-track and streamline the probe of rebel-related incidents so that they stand in a court of law.
summary: The home department, under chief minister Raghubar Das, has directed police to create a network of special investigation teams (SITs) under Jharkhand Jaguar, in a welcome move to fast-track and streamline the probe of rebel-related incidents so that they stand in a court of law.

title: Janata reunion on fast track
description: The JDU and the RJD are poised to contest the Assembly elections together after the Janata parivar splinters formally come under a new umbrella, the announcement of which is expected next month.

title: Sugar tweak to treatment
description: Bihar's state health authorities have decided to tweak the way they treat acute encephalitis amid what they say is mounting evidence linking the illness to the consumption of pulp and seeds of litchi fruits by malnourished children.
summary: Bihar's state health authorities have decided to tweak the way they treat acute encephalitis amid what they say is mounting evidence linking the illness to the consumption of pulp and seeds of litchi fruits by malnourished children.

description: The Mizoram government said it would not hesitate to strike back at the Hmar People's Convention (Democrats) militants who killed three policemen yesterday.
